pr_title: Remove the method to parent via Baggage.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * is the same instance as the one {@link #withBaggage(Baggage) placed into scope}.
          
          
            
             * is the same instance as the one {@linkplain #withBaggage(Baggage) placed into scope}.
timeline.author: anuraaga
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -16,7 +16,7 @@ * *

Implementations may have different constraints and are free to convert entry contexts to their * own subtypes. This means callers cannot assume the {@link #getCurrentBaggage() current context} - * is the same instance as the one {@link #withContext(Baggage) placed into scope}. + * is the same instance as the one {@link #withBaggage(Baggage) placed into scope}.

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/api/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/baggage/BaggageManager.java b/api/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/baggage/BaggageManager.java index 836845428..cda183b8c 100644 --- a/api/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/baggage/BaggageManager.java +++ b/api/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/baggage/BaggageManager.java @@ -16,7 +16,7 @@ import javax.annotation.concurrent.ThreadSafe; * *

Implementations may have different constraints and are free to convert entry contexts to their * own subtypes. This means callers cannot assume the {@link #getCurrentBaggage() current context} - * is the same instance as the one {@link #withBaggage(Baggage) placed into scope}. + * is the same instance as the one {@linkplain #withBaggage(Baggage) placed into scope}. * * @since 0.9.0 */

timeline.message: Turn the Baggage metadata into a simple wrapper for a String.

Remove the method to parent via Baggage.
Parenting is still implemented via the Context.
Also, renamed many old variables and method to use the new baggage name.
